languages.text: "Зачем? Это бесценный артефакт, который принадлежит мне — и до которого я успел добраться раньше, чем его украли мои собратья. Это собственность Опустошительной бури, которая не должна достаться членам других кабалов — а когда мы избавимся от Иремерисс, шпиль точно подвергнется нападению. Наконец... я могу позволить себе немного сентиментальности, м?"

"Why? It is a priceless artefact that belongs to me, and I have reclaimed it before my kin managed to steal it. It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"
languages.original_text: "Зачем? Это бесценный артефакт, который принадлежит мне — и до которого я успел добраться раньше, чем его украли мои собратья. Это собственность Опустошительной бури, которая не должна достаться членам других кабалов — а когда мы избавимся от Иремерисс, шпиль точно подвергнется нападению. Наконец... я могу позволить себе немного сентиментальности, м?"

It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"

"Why? It is a priceless artefact that belongs to me, and I have reclaimed it before my kin managed to steal it. It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"

languages.text: “为什么？因为它是属于我的无价之宝，我成功地赶在我的族人把它偷走之前，将它夺了回来。等我们解决了伊芮梅莉斯之后，她的尖塔必将遭到袭击。如果我不赶紧把这条鞭子拿走，到时候它就要落入其他阴谋团手中了。终于……我终于可以稍微放纵一下自己的欲望了，你说呢？”
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a priceless artefact that belongs to me, and I have reclaimed it before my kin managed to steal it. It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"

traits.locale_text: “为什么？因为它是属于我的无价之宝，我成功地赶在我的族人把它偷走之前，将它夺了回来。等我们解决了伊芮梅莉斯之后，她的尖塔必将遭到袭击。如果我不赶紧把这条鞭子拿走，到时候它就要落入其他阴谋团手中了。终于……我终于可以稍微放纵一下自己的欲望了，你说呢？”

languages.text: 「なぜだって？俺の貴重なアーチファクトで、親族に盗まれる前に取っておいたんだ。略奪の嵐の資産だから、他の陰謀団の手に渡ることがあってはならないーーイレメリスを処分すれば、必ず尖塔は攻撃を受けるだろう。だがら最後に…ちょっとは感傷に浸らせてくれよ？」
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a priceless artefact that belongs to me, and I have reclaimed it before my kin managed to steal it. It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"

traits.locale_text: 「なぜだって？俺の貴重なアーチファクトで、親族に盗まれる前に取っておいたんだ。略奪の嵐の資産だから、他の陰謀団の手に渡ることがあってはならないーーイレメリスを処分すれば、必ず尖塔は攻撃を受けるだろう。だがら最後に…ちょっとは感傷に浸らせてくれよ？」

languages.text: «¿Que por qué? Se trata de un artefacto de valor incalculable que además me pertenece, y lo he recuperado para evitar que mis congéneres lo roben. Es propiedad de la Tempestad Asoladora y no debe caer en manos de otra kábala; y cuando nos deshagamos de Yremeryss, sin duda atacarán la torre. Y por último... no irás a negarme un capricho sentimental, ¿no?».
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a priceless artefact that belongs to me, and I have reclaimed it before my kin managed to steal it. It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Que por qué? Se trata de un artefacto de valor incalculable que además me pertenece, y lo he recuperado para evitar que mis congéneres lo roben. Es propiedad de la Tempestad Asoladora y no debe caer en manos de otra kábala; y cuando nos deshagamos de Yremeryss, sin duda atacarán la torre. Y por último... no irás a negarme un capricho sentimental, ¿no?».

languages.text: « Vous me demandez pourquoi ? C'est un artefact inestimable qui n'appartient qu'à moi et j'ai réussi à le récupérer avant que mes congénères ne s'en emparent. Ce neurocide est la propriété de la Tempête ravageuse, et en tant que telle, il ne doit surtout pas tomber entre les mains des autres Kabales. Or, quand nous aurons réglé son compte à Yremeryss, la tour sera très certainement assiégée. En outre... disons qu'il a pour moi une grande valeur sentimentale. »
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a priceless artefact that belongs to me, and I have reclaimed it before my kin managed to steal it. It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous me demandez pourquoi ? C'est un artefact inestimable qui n'appartient qu'à moi et j'ai réussi à le récupérer avant que mes congénères ne s'en emparent. Ce neurocide est la propriété de la Tempête ravageuse, et en tant que telle, il ne doit surtout pas tomber entre les mains des autres Kabales. Or, quand nous aurons réglé son compte à Yremeryss, la tour sera très certainement assiégée. En outre... disons qu'il a pour moi une grande valeur sentimentale. »

languages.text: "Warum? Das ist ein Artefakt von unschätzbarem Wert und es gehört mir. Ich habe es mir zurückgeholt, bevor es die Meinen stehlen konnten. Es ist Eigentum des plündernden Sturms und darf unter keinen Umständen in die Hände der anderen Kabalen fallen – und wenn wir Yremeryss entsorgen, wird der Turm ganz sicher angegriffen. Und außerdem ... Ein klein wenig Sentimentalität sei mir doch sicher gegönnt, oder?"
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a priceless artefact that belongs to me, and I have reclaimed it before my kin managed to steal it. It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"

traits.locale_text: "Warum? Das ist ein Artefakt von unschätzbarem Wert und es gehört mir. Ich habe es mir zurückgeholt, bevor es die Meinen stehlen konnten. Es ist Eigentum des plündernden Sturms und darf unter keinen Umständen in die Hände der anderen Kabalen fallen – und wenn wir Yremeryss entsorgen, wird der Turm ganz sicher angegriffen. Und außerdem ... Ein klein wenig Sentimentalität sei mir doch sicher gegönnt, oder?"

languages.text: "Niye mi? Çünkü bana ait olan, paha biçilemez bir eser ve soydaşlarım çalamadan onu geri almayı başardım. Bu, Müfteris Kasırga'ya ait ve onun diğer Kabalların eline düşmesine izin veremem. Ayrıca Yremeryss'ten kurtulduğumuzda muhakkak ki kule saldırıya uğrayacak. Son olarak da... Biraz duygusallıkla kendimi şımartamaz mıyım yani?"
languages.original_text: "Why? It is a priceless artefact that belongs to me, and I have reclaimed it before my kin managed to steal it. It is property of the Reaving Tempest that must not be allowed to fall into the hands of the other Kabals — and when we dispose of Yremeryss, the spire will certainly come under attack. And lastly... I can indulge in a little sentimentality, can't I?"
